text: View of Langtree School, Woodcote, Oxfordshire. Langtree School is a secondary school with academy status for students aged 11–16 in the village of Woodcote in South Oxfordshire, England. It became a DfES Specialist Performing Arts College in 2006. The school was inspected by Ofsted in 2016, and was graded good. The nearest railway station is Goring & Streatley. ==Notable alumni== * Mark Burton, television and radio comedy writer ==References== ==External links== * Langtree School website Category:Educational institutions with year of establishment missing Category:Secondary schools in Oxfordshire Category:Schools of the performing arts in the United Kingdom Category:Academies in Oxfordshire
title: Langtree School
